Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16510163]SARS-CoV:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in HeLa cells(40% inhibition at 100 ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Virus entry into cells is mediated through interactions between spike (S) glycoprotein and angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), peptide derived from ACE2 could bind with spike glycoprotein and inhibits virus entry.

Literature.Title: Identification of critical determinants on ACE2 for SARS-CoV entry and development of a potent entry inhibitor.
Literature.Author: Han DP, Penn-Nicholson A, Cho MW.
